name: Monster Ronpa
summary:
You've met the freaky fabulous kids of famous monsters in Monster High. And you've seen the despair inducing events of Dangaronpa that ended in ultimate hope. Now get ready for the monstrously despairing mashup of the two: Monsteronpa!

Featuring all new and unique art, and a in depth full length story, Monsteronpa is a love letter to both fandoms that aims to be true to the things that made us fall in love with them. We hope that the love and care that was put into every asset shows through, and that those of you playing enjoy!
